title: Factory Tour: VanDOit’s new headquarters for custom camper vans
content:
VanDOit’s original home base gave the room to get their custom camper van business off the ground. But with demand soaring and their modular, production-line approach giving them the ability to make a lot of vans comparatively quickly, they needed more space. So they moved just down the road into a massive new warehouse, which […]

The post Factory Tour: VanDOit’s new headquarters for custom camper vans appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
